messages.message: @Serena I think you were recently removing things related to ExtractionService right?

i was looking at removing some `transformer` tasks from `celery-webdriver-tasks`

i searched our code for `ExtractionService` and `extraction_client`, and i can’t find any occurrence where it’s still actually used
cc @Dominic Fannjiang who was looking at this
we haven't removed refiner_tservice from the code base, but we stopped deploying pods for it a long time ago, so I believe refiner_tservice and ExtractionService can be safely deleted

Functionality, it’s not actually used anywhere but `extraction_client` is still getting propagated throughout the code base, I even see new functions sometimes copy-pasting it around. We should try to fully remove all reference to that client from the codebase
@Abhishek @Yash Aggarwal Is it safe to delete textbox detection service?
